meanings.sent1: She decided to ebonise the old wooden chair to give it a sleek, modern look.
meanings.sent2: The artist used a special technique to ebonise the frame of the painting.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat managed to ebonise its fur by rolling in the fireplace ashes.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds gathered, threatening to ebonise the sky before the rain started.
meanings.sent5: The magician's wand seemed to ebonise everything it touched, turning objects dark and mysterious.
